short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Change any searches made with bing to google search

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension will take tabs with a Bing search URL and change it to be a google search.

This tool can be used to easily use google search if Bing has been set as the default search engine by your enterprise admins.

IN future updates, more search engines will be added, not just bing
v1.0.2.28
